latest news

Our events

monday

The Afro Cuban lounge

7:30pm - 1am The Buffalo Bar, 259 Upper street, N1 1RU, Islington.

An Evening of Essential Afro-Cuban Flavas, Salsa Timba & Latin Jazz

If you want to up the feelgood factor Cuban style, then this Monday night at The Buffalo Bar is for you. Doors open at 7.30pm, with classes for all levels from around 7.45pm, followed by an evening of dancing, drinking and socialising to the sounds of the very best Cuban salsa, timba & son, courtesy of DJ Dr Jim.

saturday

It's a Girl Thing

2:30pm - 4:30pm The Place Dance Studio, 16 Flaxman Terrace, WC1, London.

The next ladies styling workshop will be on Sat 22nd October

Calling all chicas who like their Cuban salsa with extra sabor: It’s a Girl Thing! this Saturday at The Place Dance Studios. Ladies, it’s time to get your whole body moving, connecting footwork to hip, torso, arm & shoulder movement, so you look and feel great over the party season.

sunday

The Afro Cuban Studio

2pm - 6:30pm The Place Dance Studio, 16 Flaxman Terrace, WC1, London.

Learn Casino Salsa & The Roots of Cuban Salsa

Salsa Classes to suit everyone from complete beginner to advanced salsero, plus an hour devoted to diverse Cuban rhythms and movement.
